Brief description of the changes made.

## Type of Change

- [ ] New hosting provider added
- [ ] Existing provider updated
- [ ] Provider removed (no longer active)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Other (please describe)

## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [contributing guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] The provider is currently active and accepting customers
- [ ] I have verified the link works
- [ ] I have checked spelling and grammar
- [ ] The entry follows the format guidelines
- [ ] The entry is placed in the correct category
- [ ] The entry is alphabetically sorted within its section
- [ ] Pricing information is accurate (verified on provider's website)
- [ ] No affiliate links included

Any additional context or information about this change.
